title: Microsoft helps Robert Walters create a modern workplace for a mobile workforce
executive_summary: The Robert Walters Group is a specialist professional recruitment business that operates on a global basis. It helps businesses find the very best professionals and supports professionals and executives develop their careers in a diverse range of markets worldwide. The business has grown rapidly since its establishment in 1985 – in part, by harnessing the best tools and technologies to support its people.
products: Azure, Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Human Resources, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Power BI

title: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage provides flexible, economical storage for GE Healthcare’s medical imaging team
executive_summary: GE Healthcare’s imaging services provide state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to healthcare providers across the United States and around the world. These tools range from handheld ultrasound systems to cardiovascular imaging to AI-guided algorithms that help radiologists detect lung problems.
products: Azure Blob Storage, Azure Data Box

title: ERA Arqueologia manages projects, clients, and sales via the Microsoft cloud
executive_summary: In 1996, extraordinary archeological discoveries were made that changed the history of Herdade do Esporão in Reguengos de Monsaraz, Portugal—and the Perdigões Archaeological Complex was born. After 24 years of managing the site, ERA Arqueologia observed a major shift in its client base, and the organization realized that it needed a solution to oversee client relationships. Archaeology and heritage are key components of the company's day-to-day activities, and for managing and monitoring its projects, clients, sales, business opportunities, and teams, ERA collaborated with myPartner to implement Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales.

title: Design Offices optimizes business processes and supports rapid growth with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: German enterprise location services provider Design Offices caters to businesses of all sizes across numerous industries, offering multipurpose workspaces for temporary and long-term use. The company recently sought an IT solution to handle strong growth across its location and customer base. By embracing Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, Dynamics 365 Sales, and work in the cloud, Design Offices has scaled up and optimized its sales and purchasing processes without having to operate an independent IT infrastructure. This work is directly streamlining the company’s workflows and giving Design Offices a new way to adapt to business disruption by deploying additional capabilities without bringing in more IT staff.
products: Azure, Azure API Management, Azure Logic Apps, Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 Business Central, Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps, Power Automate, Microsoft Entra ID, Power BI

title: Accela uses Microsoft Azure to help build and deliver its suite of modern, digital government services solutions
executive_summary: Government agencies seeking to increase efficiency, save costs, and provide even better customer citizen service turn to digital government service provider Accela for its open, extensible, Microsoft Azure–based software as a service (SaaS) platform. The solution provides out-of-the-box improvements to customer interfaces and enhanced, modernized workflows that speed internal government processes. Citizens gain simpler, more efficient access, while government agencies can provide those improved experiences without additional investments in IT infrastructure.
products: Azure, Azure Disk Storage, Azure Virtual Machines, Microsoft 365
